column1: This article contains a list of '''Interviews''' relating to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his works.
* [http://www.bordersstores.com/features/feature.jsp?file=leealan Tolkien's Vision: Artist Alan Lee on Bringing The Lord of the Rings to Film]
* [http://www.herenistarion.org/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=37&Itemid=33 An Interview with Alan Lee (Heren Istarion)]
* [http://einsiders.com/features/interviews/alanlee.php An Interview with Alan Lee (Entertainment Insiders)]
